articles.title: College football early signing period expected to move earlier in December - The Athletic
articles.description: The signing period would give athletes time to sign NLIs after the conclusion of their high school seasons and just before the portal opens.
articles.content:
College footballs early signing period is expected to move to even earlier in December, ahead of the opening of the winter transfer portal window.
